about_the_game:
Zombie outbreaks have been going on for centuries and tend to happen more frequently during times of major conflicts. Many leaders believe it is because carnage germs and infections allow for rapid mutations and the easy spread of disease. The Zombie outbreaks over the centuries are misreported or are simply covered up. Lock 'n Load Tactical: Zombie The Final Enemy brings Lock 'n Load Tactical system into the world of Zombie horror and a different type of conflict.


The scenarios are designed around various missions and will have a different styles. Many objectives will be straightforward. Other times, you will be searching for food, weapons, and events that will change your mission objectives. many times you will be going into situations where you do not know what or who you may find.


We have designed a Zombie Outbreak system allowing you to play with your current Lock 'n Load Tactical games and have the possibility of having a Zombie breakout during your battles. The scenarios span from World War II all the way to the modern day.


The scenarios are designed around various missions and will have a high degree of re-playability. So grab your survival gear and get ready for something very different.

Zombie outbreaks have been going on for centuries and tend to happen more frequently during times of major conflicts. Many leaders believe it is because carnage germs and infections allow for rapid mutations and the easy spread of disease. The Zombie outbreaks over the centuries are misreported or are simply covered up. Lock 'n Load Tactical: Zombie The Final Enemy brings Lock 'n Load Tactical system into the world of Zombie horror and a different type of conflict.


The scenarios are designed around various missions and will have a different styles. Many objectives will be straightforward. Other times, you will be searching for food, weapons, and events that will change your mission objectives. many times you will be going into situations where you do not know what or who you may find.


We have designed a Zombie Outbreak system allowing you to play with your current Lock 'n Load Tactical games and have the possibility of having a Zombie breakout during your battles. The scenarios span from World War II all the way to the modern day.


The scenarios are designed around various missions and will have a high degree of re-playability. So grab your survival gear and get ready for something very different.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: MacBook, MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, Mac Mini, iMac or Mac Pro on after 2010
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Internal

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Zombies The Final Battle Battlepack 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHZ Processor or Equivalent (Running the game in higher resolution requires more processing power.)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Variable. Min 1366 x 768, Max 2560 x 1600. Optimized for 1920 x 1080. The game must run with 100% (96dpi) screen resolution.

short_description: Lock 'n Load Tactical: Zombie The Final Battle brings the Lock 'n Load Tactical system into the world of Zombie horror and a different type of conflict.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Finnish, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
